name: Kessa Okafor
core_wound: Chose her career over family during Earth's ecological collapse - stayed to excavate sites while her family fled in refugee ships, never saw them again
wants: To prove ancient aliens existed on Mars, validate her life's work and sacrifices
needs: To learn when to stop pursuing truth - that some knowledge comes at too high a price
voice_markers: Academic precision in speech, uses technical terminology naturally
References Earth archaeology and human history as comparisons
Becomes passionate and animated when discussing discoveries
Falls silent when emotionally overwhelmed, processes internally
contradiction: Dedicated to preserving and understanding alien culture while humanity actively destroys it through terraforming

relationships.Dmitri Volkov: Professional antagonism - he wants to exploit what she wants to preserve
relationships.Sage: Mentor-student evolving to equals - sees in Sage the Mars-first perspective she initially lacked
relationships.The Gardener: Complex relationship with alien AI - from specimen to communication partner to ally
relationships.Admiral Zhang Wei: Sympathizes with refugee crisis but opposes forced landing solution

physical_description: Early 40s, Nigerian descent, tall and lean from years in low gravity, Mars dust permanently staining her work clothes, carries herself with academic authority
background: Arrived on Mars 12 years ago as part of the initial archaeological survey. Discovered the first artifacts at Jezero crater. Has spent years trying to get funding to excavate Olympus Mons anomalies, finally succeeds just as corporate interests want to suppress findings. Lost contact with family during Earth's refugee crisis.

character_arc.book_1: Discovers The Beneath structure, excitement turns to horror as she realizes terraforming will trigger defensive response, corporate interests suppress her warnings, watches first colony die
character_arc.book_2: Deciphers alien AI's purpose, realizes aliens weren't visitors but Mars' original terraformers who succeeded then died out, humanity repeating their process will trigger 'correction', fights for halt to terraforming
character_arc.book_3: Makes choice to merge consciousness with The Gardener to become translator between human and alien ecology, sacrifices her humanity to save both species of humans that emerge, achieves understanding at cost of self
